content.p: We are aware of fake job offers from fraudulent parties claiming to represent the University of Nottingham Malaysia (UNM). Offers of employment should only come from the University's Human Resources Department, authorised University personnel or recruitment agencies we have appointed. Job seekers are advised to be cautious of any suspicious recruitment activities claiming to be from UNM. For clarification, email us at recruitment@nottingham.edu.my or contact us at 03-87253696 from 9am-5pm on weekdays. There are no results that match your criteria. See all vacancies telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001 email: hr@nottingham.edu.my
